thread.title: The truth about Skripal is being hidden, says Moscow

title: The truth about Skripal is being hidden, says Moscow
text:
The truth about Skripal is being hidden, says Moscow 1:15pm GMT - 01:04 
Russia's foreign ministry says London is still refusing to work with Moscow on the investigation into the poisoning of former spy Sergei Skirapal, stating the ''truth is obviously being hidden''. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Russia's foreign ministry says London is still refusing to work with Moscow on the investigation into the poisoning of former spy Sergei Skirapal, stating the "truth is obviously being hidden". Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2IsZlCS
